original_text: so that the land could not support both of them dwelling together; for their possessions were so great that they could not dwell together,
korean_text: 그 땅이 그들이 동거하기에 넉넉하지 못하였으니 이는 그들의 소유가 많아서 동거할 수 없었음이니라

sentences.original_text: so that the land could not support both of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅이 그 둘을 모두 감당할 수 없었으니

sentences.original_text: for their possessions were so great
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그들의 소유가 너무 많았기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: that they could not dwell together,
